author: A_Brickset_user
title: Neat little wheely car!
review: I just got this set, and it's really cool. It can do wheelies! I like the big wheels and the color scheme. There are a few pieces that would be good for building in this set, like the windshield.This set also has a partner you can combine it with, which I might like to get. Overall, I give it an eight,Lego's done a good job.

author: Alemas
title: WHEEEEEELIES!
review:
Yep, it can do wheelies! It has huge wheels, nice sidepipes, pull-back motor, trans-blue 1x1 round plates, and wheelie function!

Pros:

Wheels
Sidepipes
Trans-blue pieces
Pull-back motor
Wheelies!

Cons:

None!

Overall, a wheelie good set! LOL!
